glsa.title: SNMP: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in SNMP could lead to a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: SNMP is a widely used protocol for monitoring the health and welfare of network equipment.

description.p: A specially crafted trap message triggers a conversion to an erroneous variable type when the -OQ option is used.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All SNMP users should upgrade to the latest version:
